mapper.select: select SALE_NO , SALE_KIND_CD , DATEDIFF(date(OPEN_DT), now()) as DDAY , COLUMN_JSON(TITLE_BLOB) AS TITLE_BLOB , WWW_DISP_YN , FROM_DT , TO_DT , STAT_CD , OPEN_DT from SALE where DEL_YN = 'N' and STAT_CD in ('upcoming') and WWW_DISP_YN = 'Y' and SALE_OUTSIDE_YN = 'N' and DATE_FORMAT(TO_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') >= current_date order by OPEN_DT;

select * from ( select S.SALE_NO , IF(S.SALE_KIND_CD in ('online','online_zb'), 'ONLINE', 'LIVE') AS SALE_KIND , COLUMN_JSON(S.TITLE_BLOB) AS TITLE_BLOB , S.FROM_DT , S.TO_DT from SALE S where S.STAT_CD ='open' and S.WWW_DISP_YN = 'Y' and S.SALE_OUTSIDE_YN = 'N' and S.FROM_DT <= now() and ( case when S.SALE_KIND_CD in ('online','online_zb') then (select MAX(L.TO_DT) > now() from LOT L where L.STAT_CD = 'entry' and L.SALE_NO = S.SALE_NO) when S.SALE_KIND_CD in ('main','hongkong','plan') then (select IF(count(*) > 1, true, false) from LOT L where l.CLOSE_YN = 'N' and L.STAT_CD = 'entry' and L.SALE_NO = S.SALE_NO and s.SALE_OUTSIDE_YN = 'N') end ) order by S.TO_DT desc limit 5 ) SR order by field(SR.SALE_KIND, 'LIVE', 'ONLINE')

-- 메뉴 count (진행경매/예정경매/전시/아카데미) select COUNT( case when S.SALE_KIND_CD in ('online','online_zb') then (select MAX(L.TO_DT) >= now() from LOT L where L.STAT_CD = 'entry' and L.SALE_NO = S.SALE_NO) when S.SALE_KIND_CD in ('main','hongkong','plan') then (select IF(count(*) > 1, true, false) from LOT L where l.CLOSE_YN = 'N' and L.STAT_CD = 'entry' and L.SALE_NO = S.SALE_NO) end ) as AuctionCount , COUNT(case when S.STAT_CD = 'upcoming' then 1 end) as UpcomingCount , COUNT(case when S.SALE_KIND_CD IN ('exhibit', 'exhibit_sa') then 1 end) as ExhibitionCount ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACADEMY WHERE DEL_YN != 'Y' and TO_DT >= now()) as AcademyCount from SALE S where S.DEL_YN = 'N' and S.WWW_DISP_YN = 'Y' and S.SALE_OUTSIDE_YN = 'N' and S.TO_DT >= now();
select * from sale_img where SALE_NO = #{sale_no} order by DISP_ORD limit 1

select B.SALE_NO, L.LOT_NO from BID B inner join LOT L on B.SALE_NO = L.SALE_NO and B.LOT_NO = L.LOT_NO where B.BID_KIND_CD in ('online_auto', 'online_once') and B.CUST_NO = #{action_user_no} and L.TO_DT <= now() and (select count(*) from LOT_PAY LP where LP.SALE_NO = B.SALE_NO and LP.LOT_NO = B.LOT_NO) < 1 group by B.SALE_NO, B.LOT_NO;
